payload.title: FeedbackRecord Complete - Factory + Validator + Tests
payload.description: Implement complete FeedbackRecord with factory (createFeedbackRecord), validator (validateFeedbackRecordDetailed, isFeedbackRecord, validateFullFeedbackRecord) and comprehensive EARS tests. Includes auto-generated types and assignment logic for agent collaboration.
payload.notes: FeedbackRecord implemented as nervous system for GitGovernance collaboration. Factory with smart status defaults (assignment → resolved, others → open), validator with schema + checksum + signatures, 8 EARS tests covering all cases. Enables structured human-agent communication.
